name: IRIS 2
categories: Skincare, High Tech Tools, Facial Cleansing Brushes
about: What it is:An eye massager that minimizes the appearance of ufb01ne lines and dark circles and works to increase lymphatic drainage and the absorption of eye care cosmetics..What Else You Need to Know:The IRIS 2 is inspired by ancient lymphatic drainage techniques and is revolutionized by patented T-Sonic massage pulsations from Sweden.  Built to perfectly fit the eye contour, IRIS 2 also enhances the efficacy of your eye serums by increasing absorption, pushing them deep into your skin where they work best..Clinical Results:In a 28-day clinical study of 25 women, results showed the following:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Unlock your device by pressing down the + and - buttons together. The indicator light will then flash to indicate that your device is unlocked..-Start with a clean and dry face. Apply dots of any eye care products of your choice around your eyes, if desired..-Press the universal button to turn on IRIS 2. You can adjust the intensity with the + and - buttons. To deactivate T-Sonic massage, press the universal button once more..-Gently press IRIS 2 under the inner corner of your eye, and glide under and around the eye contour for 30 seconds. Then repeat on the opposite eye. IRIS 2 will automatically turn off after 3 minutes..-Pro tip: The front of IRIS 2 (with the buttons) should be turned toward your face..-Pro tip: You can also use IRIS 2 on the forehead to relax facial muscle tension points.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love foreo products. I have the Luna 3 plus, bear, UFO, and the body brush. They have all been AMAZING and Iu2019ve noticed a difference in my skin. With the iris, Iu2019m not sure if my eyes are too sensitive but my eyes get irritated after using this. I havenu2019t noticed a difference so far but itu2019s only been a week.
